title: Tourist Trap
description: Entry Cassandra Grace Horseback riding (jumping) Animal Lola (best horse in the world!) Fee Um, almost . . . See, the thing is, I almost have enough money, I have tons of riding students who pay me, but there's this guy, and every time he calls I have to see him, so I've kind of been skipping work lately . . . but I'll have the fee soon, I promise!
author: Emma Harrison
